CustomField.formula: IF( OR(TEXT( Apttus_QPConfig__DerivedFromId__r.Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Cubic_Factor__c )==null,TEXT( Apttus_QPConfig__DerivedFromId__r.Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Cubic_Factor__c )=='0') && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_QPConfig__AttributeValueId__r.APTS_Price_Structure__c, 'WINE {Z30}')) , 'Cubic Factor non-assessed, '&"'Y' " & 'status to be applied, dimensions declaration needed', 'Cubic Factor assessed, Cubic Factor = '& TEXT(Apttus_QPConfig__DerivedFromId__r.Apttus_Config2__AttributeValueId__r.APT_Cubic_Factor__c ) &' , '&"'N' "& 'status to be applied')
CustomField.label: Cubic Factor
